channel.title: Gibson.com Audio Podcast Series
channel.itunes:author: Gibson Guitar Corp.
channel.description: Gibson is known worldwide for producing classic models in every major style of fretted instrument including acoustic and electric guitars. Enjoy music, interviews, product reviews and special live performances from some of Gibson's artists.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Gibson is known worldwide for producing classic models in every major style of fretted instrument including acoustic and electric guitars. Enjoy music, interviews, product reviews and special live performances from some of Gibson's artists.
